Required as latest release of libsodium-sumo-wrapper doesn't expose crypto_core_hchacha20, but master branch does.

thirdparty/libsodium-wrapper-sumo/package.json -> git@github.com:jedisct1/libsodium.js.git/package-libsodium-wrappers-sumo.json
thirdparty/libsodium-wrapper-sumo/dist/modules-sumo/libsodium-wrappers.js -> git@github.com:jedisct1/libsodium.js.git/dist/modules-sumo/libsodium-wrappers.js
